name: Pasquale Foggia
content: Pasquale Foggia – MIVIA Contact Dept of Electronic and Computer Engineering University of Salerno Via Ponte Don Melillo, 1 I83013 – Fisciano (SA), Italy Building: Stecca V, Room 288 Phone: +39 089 964275 Fax: +39 089 964218 Mail: pfoggia@unisa.it Skype: Research Activities Classification Paradigms Graph based classification and learning Image analysis and recognition Video analysis and interpretation Biography Pasquale Foggia received in 1995 a Laurea degree (cum laude) in Computer Engineering, and in 1999 a Ph.D. in Electronic and Computer Engineering from the ”Federico II” University of Naples, Italy. From 2004 to 2008 he has been Associate Professor of Computer Science at the Department of Computer Science and Systems of the same university, while since 2008 he is at the University of Salerno. His research interests include basic methodologies and applications in the fields of Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition; he is author of several research papers on these subjects. He is a member of the IAPR, and has been involved in the activities of the IAPR Technical Committee 15 (Graph-based Representations in Pattern Recognition) since 1997.
